mapper.insert: insert into order_master (id, open_id, user_name, user_phone, user_address, order_amount, order_status, pay_status, creat_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order_master set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_amount = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, open_id, user_name, user_phone, user_address, order_amount, order_status, pay_status, creat_time, update_time from order_master where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
